name: Glow Doodle 2
description:
Glow Doodle 2 allows you to share the "vibrancy" of your neon style drawings & hand writings with friends because it turns your drawing into light flashing movies!

What's more, you can now bring along a preview of your latest drawing on Glow Doodle 2 to your Apple Watch!* So that you can continue to enjoy your current masterpiece on your wrist anytime anywhere. You will be amazed how stunning your glow drawings look on your Apple Watch!

This is the official follow-up to the innovative classic app "Glow Doodle". In case you don't know, it's the mysterious doodle app that hit the Top 5 overall paid chart in both the US & UK App Stores^.


* To explicitly sync your latest drawing to Apple Watch Glow Doodle 2, tap "Glow" or "Save" in Glow Doodle 2 on your connected iOS device. Note that preview of your drawing on Apple Watch Glow Doodle 2 is not animated. Depending on the complexity of your drawing & connection condition, preview sync time may vary.
^ January 2010
